1   package nl.knaw.huygens.alexandria.external;
2   
3   import static org.mockito.Mockito.mock;
4   
5   import nl.knaw.huygens.alexandria.endpoint.Resources;
6   import nl.knaw.huygens.alexandria.helpers.ApiFixture;
7   import nl.knaw.huygens.alexandria.service.ResourceService;
8   import org.junit.BeforeClass;
9   import org.mockito.Mockito;
10  
11  public class ResourcesFixture extends ApiFixture {
12    private static ResourceService RESOURCE_SERVICE_MOCK = mock(ResourceService.class);
13  
14    @Override
15    public void clear() {
16      super.clear();
17      Mockito.reset(RESOURCE_SERVICE_MOCK);
18    }
19  
20    @BeforeClass
21    public static void setup() {
22      addClass(Resources.class);
23      addProviderForContext(ResourceService.class, RESOURCE_SERVICE_MOCK);
24    }
25  
26    protected ResourceService resourceService() {
27      return RESOURCE_SERVICE_MOCK;
28    }
29  }
